tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ***** ********** ** *********** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ***** **** ***** ******. My brother in law was treated by him and his group at Columbia Asia on covid related issues.  He literally gave him a new life. I'm a pharmacist in the USA and have been in close contact on how he was being  treated at Sagar hospitals where he was not only  treated horrible but also had to experience life threatening conditions as a result of the treatment he recieved at Sagar (Sagar hospital hasn't followed any basic protocols related to his covid treatment)
Dr. Magesh Balakrishnan (Cardiologist) is my brother in laws life saver who insisted on joining him at Columbia Asia and after which my brother in law was truly saved by all their efforts.  He guided us throughout and we are so grateful for all his efforts and guidance!
My family can't thank them enough and forever indebted to these great doctors! 
The treatment was to the point and very efficient.  Thank you  the whole columbia asia doctors!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted him for my husband's dengue treatment. He was very quick in diagnosing the issue and very prompt to take the corrective action. His diagnosis and treatment was to the point, which shows that he is an experienced doctor. 
At times I felt little intimidated and I think he can be little friendly/soft with his patients/families. I understand the fact that people do ask silly questions to doctors (even I did) but that's how it is, since we just want an assurance that our loved ones are in the safe hands.
Other than that he is an excellent doctor and I would recommend him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr Sunil for pain in my right arm and explained the background (not sure if he really listened to that).  He gave me 2 medicines as follows:
Tab WYSOLONE 30mg 1-0-0 x 5 days (After food)
Tab ULTRACET 1-01

I clearly told him my B.P. was measured 161/96 during vitals checkups at the Hospital prior to Docotor visit and I generally have high B.P.  130/92-95.

He said, we will see B.P.  problem later and let's now focus on your arm pain.

After starting WYSOLONE (30mg dose prescribed by Dr. Sunil) ,  second of dose I felt some swellling on my face, 3rd day it was even more swelled and I was feeling headrounds so went to see another general physician at different hospital, and my B.P.  was measured 113/167.  

******* ** ********* ** ** ******  ***** ********* *** **** ********* *** ** **** *** **** **** **** ** ******** *** ** ***** ** * ******* *** ** ************ *** **** *** ********** ******** **** *** ******* ** ****** ** ** ************ *** ****** **** ** ***** ******** ** ********

I will never visit Dr Sunil again nor reccommend to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was in hurry. Did not pay enough attention in listening the problem and was not in a mood to share the  treatment .He just made sure I understand the prescribed dosage. It was not a doctor patient relation but kind of forced work he was completing.
reply_text: Sad to hear that.   I hope you are doing well. If not feeling good come back no need to take appointment   just walk-in to Hospital. Regards.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been consulting Dr.Sunil for over 10 years now for my mother's Diabetes and Blood Pressure management. He has been excellent in all ups and downs throughout these years. He has been very approachable and helpful. His warm and co-operation has always helped us during all the critical stages of illness for my family members. He is a great Doctor and a greater human being. I strongly recommend Dr.Sunil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited Dr.Sunil Havannavar at Columbia-Asia Sarjapur Road. I felt he should have spent some time to listen to my medical condition and explain new treatment plan.
Did not feel the doctor patient connect, ** *** **** ** * ****** **** ** ******* **** *** ****** ************** **** ****** ** **** ******* **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor's expertise is really applaudable. ** ** **** **** ********* *** ***** ** **** ** friendly in nature. He will make sure you walk down from his chamber with a result if you have your reports with you. what else you need. Yes I had to wait for more than 45 minutes but I think that was worth. Always recommended.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: My helper was suffering from back and abdominal pain .This doctor without asking much details referred her to another doctor Vishwanath (general surgeon) and made us take an appointment who later seeing the lab report told us that this is not his department  and again referred to an urologist.so overall we paid to 3 doctors plus ultrasound and urine test****** **** ******** **** ** ***** ***** ****
reply_text: Hi. The case was transferred to surgeon. I have clearly mentioned to staff about it. In such cases my consultation fees will be transferred to surgeon. U need not to pay for him. U need to pay only if it's reffered but since it surgical  issue I have transferred to surgical department. If this has not happened meet me next time when u come I will rectify u. Wish a speedy recovery for ur maid. Let me know. Regards. Dr Sunil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The overall experience was good but I felt the doctor could have been little more slower in explaining about the tablets and listen to all my problems

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I WAS RECOMONDED BY A PHYSICIAN IN DELHI TO MEET DR SUNIL HAVANNAVAR FOR PUO. I AM FROM UP. HE WORKED UP WELL AND CAME TO A DIAGNOSIS.  AND I WAS ADMITTED IN HIS CARE. HE IS GOOD AT RARE AND COMPLICATED CASE HANDELLING.

review: Not at all friendly doctor. He just saw/listened and wrote a medicine. No explanation why this happened, how to prevent in future nothing. On asking he spoke 2-3 sentences thats all.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ******* ******* ****** **** ***** dr prescribed one painkiller and asked to get some tests done and come back after 5 days with the reports. I could have gotten the reports same day itself but he wanted to see it after 5 days only he said ****** ***** * **** ** ********** *** ******* ** ****** *** ** ****** ** ******* ******** *** ******** ******** *** ****** he was focused in typing in laptop. it was just  wastage of time and money

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was very impatient. He did not have any interest in checking our reports done from a different lab. He did not even have the patience to listen, he just kept typing his observations. He gave a new big list of tests to be done before he would say anything. With a big fee already paid, he did not give any comments or assurance, he told us he cannot say anything until new tests are done. No value for the amount paid towards registration and fees. Please avoid if possible.
reply_text:
Hi.
Kindly provide ur details.
I would like to whatever tests are asked.

review: Admitted and effectively treated by Dr. Sunil for food poisoning and got discharged within 36 hours
